00027 #define DLE_NUM_BEST_MATCHES 4
00028 #define DLE_STRICT_UTF8_CHECKING 1
00029 
00030 typedef struct _LanguageAndEncodingMatch
00031 {
00032         const char * szLanguage;
00033         const char * szEncoding;
00034         double dScore;
00035 } LanguageAndEncodingMatch;
00036 
00037 typedef struct _LanguageAndEncodingResult
00038 {
00039         LanguageAndEncodingMatch match[DLE_NUM_BEST_MATCHES]; // the first best matches
00040         double dAccuracy; // accuracy score: from 0 to 100
00041 } LanguageAndEncodingResult;
00042 
00043 void detect_language_and_encoding(const char * data,LanguageAndEncodingResult * retBuffer,int iFlags);
